channel.title: [RESOLVED] Could I please get a refund?
channel.description:
**What happened:** I bought the game, but it's not compatible with my (or any other) computers in my house. It requires 64 bits or something, and I only have 32. I sent an email back in September, asking for a refund, being as I can't play the game, but I haven't received a response.
**What was SUPPOSED to happen:** In a dream world I would have had a compatible computer. But I don't. :(
**Steps to reproduce this issue:**
1. Bought the game 2. Error 3. Can't play it
**Steps to fix this issue:** 1. Refund 2. Happy customer!
